named-native-query.name: QuestionByCertificationAndQuestionnaireSetAndQuestionnaire
named-native-query.query: SELECT QRS.NAME AS QUESTIONNARIE_SET_NAME, QRE.NAME AS QUESTIONNARIE_NAME, Q.ID AS QUESTION_ID, LEFT(Q.VALUE, 25) ||'...' AS VALUE, Q.NUM_ORDER AS QUESTION_ORDER, SUM(case EQ.CORRECT when true then 1 else 0 end) AS QTY_CORRECT, SUM(case EQ.CORRECT when false then 1 else 0 end) AS QTY_INCORRECT FROM QUESTION Q INNER JOIN QUESTIONNARIE QRE ON QRE.ID = Q.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID INNER JOIN QUESTIONNARIE_SET QRS ON QRS.ID = QRE.SET_ID LEFT JOIN EXAM_QUESTION EQ ON (EQ.QUESTION_ID = Q.ID AND EQ.STATUS = 'FINISHED') WHERE 1 = 1 AND QRE.CERTIFICATION_ID = ? AND QRE.SET_ID = ? AND QRE.ID = ? GROUP BY QRS.NAME, QRE.NAME, Q.ID, Q.VALUE, Q.NUM_ORDER ORDER BY QRS.NAME, QRE.NAME, Q.NUM_ORDER
